title: Ticket #3234: Cream security broken with Globus 5.2
description:
There's a bug in the org.glite.security.gss module used by the cream_gahp, in which it sets the wrong buffer length (to a value that's too small) when calling gss_import_cred(). It appears older versions of Globus tolerated the incorrect length, but Globus 5.2 does not.

The result is that the cream_gahp is unable to import the user's proxy and cannot authenticate with the server. Gahp commands return this error message: "Cannot set credentials in the gsoap-plugin context"
